locations.name: Athens
locations.description: The capital of Greece, renowned as the cradle of Western civilization, featuring ancient landmarks like the Acropolis and the historic Plaka district.

locations.name: Santorini
locations.description: A volcanic island famous for its dramatic caldera views, stunning sunsets, unique beaches, and charming villages like Oia and Fira.

locations.name: Mykonos
locations.description: A cosmopolitan island known for its vibrant energy, picturesque Mykonos Town (Chora), iconic windmills, beautiful beaches, and sophisticated atmosphere.
